data.title: Camping at Sandbanks Provincial Park
data.meta_description: Information about camping at Sandbanks Provincial Park.
data.text:
Car Camping

Sandbanks offers over 500 car campsites in five campground areas: Outlet River A & B, Cedars in the East Lake sector, Richardson’s in the West Lake sector and the Woodlands Campground located between East and West Lake sectors of the park. Campsites in these campgrounds accommodate equipment ranging from tents only to large trailers. Amenities such as water taps, comfort stations and laundry facilities are close by.

Outlet A with its many waterfront sites is very popular with campers. A few sites offer electrical service. This is a busy campground with sites that are grouped relatively close together. Outlet B offers a bit more privacy with some sites along the Outlet River and a loop with electrical pull-through sites.

Cedars is a family oriented campground offering more sheltered, private campsites. It has less traffic than the Outlet campgrounds but the beach is still close by.

The Woodlands Campground offers both shady and sunny sites. Sunny sites are preferred by fall campers when temperatures are cooler. All sites in the Woodland Campground offer electrical service. Swimming, boating and the Visitor Centre are only a short distance away.

Richardson’s Campground also offers a mix of sunny and shady sites. Richardson campground offers 19 campsites that are electrical.

Group Camping

Sandbanks has two group campsites that vary in size and can accommodate from 30 to 50 people. These group campsites are suitable for tent camping only and cannot accommodate trailers. Water taps are nearby and vault toilets are on site. Outlet Beach is approximately 1 km away.

Reservations can be made online or by phone.

Roofed Accommodation

Cottage

Number at Park: 1

Site Number(s) / Name: Maplerest Heritage House

Nearby to park trails, beaches and day-use facilities, this four bedroom Victorian Home is furnished with antiques. A great place to stay when planning for a luxurious Sandbanks vacation. The cottage is available for reservation year-round.

Check-in/Check-out

4pm/10am

Sleeps:

8

Amenities

This home has a fully equipped kitchen, including dishes, cutlery and appliances. It sleeps eight, in four bedrooms each with its own bathroom. The primary bedroom has a queen size bed and a whirlpool bath. The 3 additional bedrooms are equipped with one double bed each. Bedding and towels are not supplied. There is an additional washroom with laundry facilities by the kitchen and a large screened in porch with patio furnishings. A stereo system, an inside gas fireplace, a barbeque with propane and a campfire pit are included. This facility is wheelchair accessible.

What to Bring

Visitors should bring towels, bedding and all consumable items such as food, dish soap, etc.

Restrictions

Reservations are available for 6 nights only (Saturday to Friday).

Please note that domestic animals (pets) are not permitted in the cottage and smoking is prohibited. WIFI is not available.

Parking

​Parking for one vehicle is included. Additional vehicles require permits. 4 vehicles max.

How to Reserve

Reservations for the Maple Rest Heritage House can be made online or by phone.

Cottage

Number at Park: 1

Site Number(s) / Name: Jacques Cottage

Located on the shores of Lake Ontario within Sandbanks this one and a half story cottage is a short bicycle ride from the Outlet and Sandbanks beaches. The cottage is available for reservation year-round.

Check-in/Check-out

4pm/10am

Sleeps:

4

Amenities

The cottage has a primary bedroom with a double bed and a loft area with two single beds. Visitors will find a fully equipped kitchen (including dishes, cutlery and appliances), propane fireplace, barbeque with propane and a campfire pit. Bedding and towels are not supplied.

What to Bring

Visitors should bring towels, bedding and all consumable items such as food, dish soap, etc.

Restrictions

Reservations are available for 6 nights only (Saturday to Friday).

Please note that domestic animals (pets) are not permitted in the cottage and smoking is prohibited. WIFI is not available.

Parking

Parking for one vehicle is included. Additional vehicles require permits. 2 vehicles max.

How to Reserve
